list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a platform or compartment housed in a shaft for raising and lowering people or things to different floors or levels.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in the elevator she pressed the button for the lobby
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trong thang máy, cô nhấn nút cho sảnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a machine consisting of an endless belt with scoops attached, used typically for raising grain to be stored in an upper story.
a hinged flap on the horizontal stabilizer of an aircraft, typically one of a pair, used to control the motion of the aircraft about its lateral axis.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: first you trim the rudder, then the ailerons, and finally the elevator
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đầu tiên bạn tỉa bánh lái, sau đó là Ailerons và cuối cùng là thang máy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a muscle whose contraction raises a part of the body.
